name: Distributed Cache System
description: Built a distributed caching layer that reduced database load by 60% and improved API response times by 40%. Implemented consistent hashing and replication strategies.

name: AI Code Assistant
description: Developed an AI-powered code completion tool using transformer models. Integrated with VS Code and supports multiple programming languages.

name: Real-time Analytics Dashboard
description: Created a real-time analytics platform processing 10K+ events per second. Features interactive charts, live data streaming, and custom alerting.

name: Cloud Infrastructure Automation
description: Automated cloud infrastructure deployment with infrastructure-as-code. Reduced deployment time from hours to minutes with zero-downtime deployments.
